en.name: An Instant Before A Gaze
en.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by {{36//42//48//54//60%}}. When the wearer uses Ultimate, increases the wearer's Ultimate DMG based on their Max Energy. Each point of Energy increases the Ultimate DMG by {{0.36//0.42//0.48//0.54//0.6%}}, up to 180 points of Energy.

zh.name: 片刻，留在眼底
zh.description: 使装备者的暴击伤害提高{{36//42//48//54//60%}}。当装备者施放终结技时，根据装备者的能量上限，提高装备者终结技造成的伤害：每点能量提高{{0.36//0.42//0.48//0.54//0.6%}}，最多计入180点。
